headline: SEC fines Blackstone, KKR, Apollo, others in texting crackdown
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Affiliates of Blackstone Inc., KKR & Co., Apollo Global Management Inc. and Charles Schwab Corp. are among a dozen investment advisers and brokerages that will collectively pay more than $63 million for failing to track employees’ use of unauthorized communications platforms.Most Read from BloombergThese Homes Withstood the LA Fires. headline: Record PE Portfolio Company Bankruptcies; Ranking Top Private Credit Managers
summary: Bankruptcy filings by US private equity portfolio companies hit a record high in 2024, led by consumer discretionary & healthcare sectors, according to S&P Global Market Intelligence data.
